name: Ten seconds in the 90's (4:11 - 4:19)
description:
2020. 

I went through testimonies of victims who suffered violence from the Colombian military, ELN, paramilitary, and FARC. In this project, I created a clock that over a period of ten minutes, displays a unique version of these stories. To be able to view this clock, the left-most side displays the current minute represented by the number of words, the middle column represents the ten’s place digit of the seconds (thus it changes every 10 seconds) and the rightmost column represents the one’s digit. 

This gif represents the passage of time between 4:11 and 4:19, with a unique story in each frame.
